author: markt
msg: Fix CVE-2014-0050. Specially crafted input can trigger a DoS if the buffer used by the MultipartStream is not big enough. When constructing MultipartStream enforce the requirements for buffer size by throwing an IllegalArgumentException if the requested buffer size is too small. This prevents the DoS.

author: asanso
msg: SLING-3332 - Long startup time with many sling:alias
* applied patch. The alias optimization introduced in SLING-2521 can be turned off in particular cases (e.g. huge number of alias entries)

author: shalin
msg: SOLR-5629: SolrIndexSearcher.name should include core name
